attributes.action: If Muslims or other religions are not happy with British law or cultures, leave.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many religious races other than christianity are complaining about ridiculous things. For example the soldiers fighting the war on terror and the bible moving to the top shelves of libraries as it may offend them. It is ludicrous.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
